meanings: Verb 컴퓨터 역(逆)어셈블하다(컴퓨터 코드를 인간 언어로 바꾸다)

vlive.korean: 먹어 봤을 거 아니야! 다 흘리네. - 뭐든지 다 분해하면 됐어. You probably ate it! I'm spilling. - It was okay if you disassemble it. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 사녹직후 대기실에 아스트로😁
vlive.english: You probably ate it! I'm spilling. - It was okay if you disassemble it.

vlive.korean: 빼는데 오래 걸리네요. - 이거 여기까지 있는 거 아닙니까? It takes a long time to disassemble. - Isn't it connected all the way down here? 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : Underdog - 언더독 '언더독, 공놀이 좋아해?!'
vlive.english: It takes a long time to disassemble. - Isn't it connected all the way down here?

examples.korean: The concert ended and the crowd disassembled. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 콘서트는 끝이 나고 사람들은 흩어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The concert ended and the crowd disassembled. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I disassembled the broken computer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 고장 난 컴퓨터를 뜯어 보았다 Neungyule
examples.english: I disassembled the broken computer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The building will be disassembled today. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오늘 그 건물의 해체 작업을 실시할 예정이다 Neungyule
examples.english: The building will be disassembled today. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Workers disassembled the bridge in 1968, numbering the bricks, and sent them to Los Angeles. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 1968년에 작업인부들이 그 다리를 그 다리를 분해하여 벽돌마다 번호를 매긴 후 그 벽돌들을 로스앤젤레스로 보냈다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Workers disassembled the bridge in 1968, numbering the bricks, and sent them to Los Angeles. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The U.S. Supreme Court said it could not prohibit the use of handguns for self-defense reasons in the home, and therefore overruled the District of Columbia's gun-control law requiring lawful weapons to be locked or disassembled when not in use. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 미국 대법원은, 가정에서 자기 방어용으로 권총을 사용하는 것을 금지할 수는 없었기 때문에, 사용하지 않을 때는 합법적인 총기에 안전 장치를 해놓거나 해체해 놓을 것을 요구하는, 콜롬비아 특별구의 총기 규제법을 기각(무시)했다고 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: The U.S. Supreme Court said it could not prohibit the use of handguns for self-defense reasons in the home, and therefore overruled the District of Columbia's gun-control law requiring lawful weapons to be locked or disassembled when not in use. Add to Wordbook
